    openthl R package

    R package for reading data from the THL open data API.

    API documentation

    Installation and use

    See the Articles section at the package homepage for more.

    Contribute

    Contributions are very welcome:

    • Use issue tracker for feedback and bug reports.
    • Send pull requests
    • Star us on the Github page
    • Join the discussion in Gitter

    Acknowledgements

    Kindly cite this work as follows: Tuomo Nieminen and Leo Lahti. Retrieval and analysis of THL open data with the openthl package. R package version 0.1.1. URL: http://ropengov.github.io/openthl

    We are grateful to all contributors, and for THL open data portal! This project is part of rOpenGov.
